title: In Game Bug Issue (looking for assistance)
body:
I've now experienced this in my two previous soloq games, one time in the middle of a game and one at the very start in fountain.

Issue: Game is open, I can see everything. However neither my mouse nor keyboard can actually function. So i can't move, use my abilities or even type to my team that im having an issue (resulting most likely in 9x reports). I've noticed that the cursor itself turns back to the regular windows cursor, and i can move it around but its as if the game is some video that i cant actually interact with. The mouse and keyboard work completely fine as if i alt+tab, i can still use my computer properly, its just an in game issue. The only way I could fix it was with restarting the entire computer.

Not sure if anyone else has had this problem, however it is a fairly tilting one and makes me nervous to play soloq again.

Thanks in advance,
NitroGoat

replies.body:
This usually happens when there's an overlay conflicting with League (you're basically trying to interact with a non functioning overlay instead of League itself).

Discord overlay is the one causing this issue at the moment, so turn it off and it should all be g.
